response: Rakhi ek special thread hota hai jo bhai-behen ke beech pyaar dikhane ke liye bandha jata hai. Behen apne bhai ki wrist par rakhi bandhkar uski safety aur khushi ki dua karti hai, aur bhai bhi usse gift ya promise deta hai. Rakhi bahut sundar aur colorful hoti hai, aur isse ghar par ya market se kharida ja sakta hai. Tumhe rakhi banana pasand hai?
